title: Concretizer fails with unhelpful error message when a dag is given as dependency
body:
Trying to concretize `fftw+mpi ^/{mpich-dag}` fails with unhelpful error. 

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
[sas4990@quser10 ~]$ spack find -lv mpich
==> 1 installed package
-- linux-rhel7-ivybridge / gcc@8.3.0 ----------------------------
btlyk64 mpich@3.3.2 device=ch4 +hydra netmod=ucx +pci pmi=pmi2 +romio+slurm~verbs+wrapperrpath
[sas4990@quser10 ~]$ spack spec -I fftw+mpi ^/btlyk64 %gcc@8.3.0
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   fftw+mpi
[+]      ^mpich@3.3.2%gcc@8.3.0 device=ch4 +hydra netmod=ucx +pci pmi=pmi2 +romio+slurm~verbs+wrapperrpath arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^libpciaccess@0.13.5%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^libxml2@2.9.9%gcc@8.3.0~python arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@8.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^slurm@19-05-3-2%gcc@8.3.0~gtk~hdf5~hwloc~mariadb~pmix+readline arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   fftw@3.3.8%gcc@8.3.0+mpi~openmp~pfft_patches precision=double,float arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]      ^mpich@3.3.2%gcc@8.3.0 device=ch4 +hydra netmod=ucx +pci pmi=pmi2 +romio+slurm~verbs+wrapperrpath arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^libpciaccess@0.13.5%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^libxml2@2.9.9%gcc@8.3.0~python arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@8.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^slurm@19-05-3-2%gcc@8.3.0~gtk~hdf5~hwloc~mariadb~pmix+readline arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge

Input spec
--------------------------------
==> Error: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'endswith'
[sas4990@quser10 ~]$
...
```

### Error Message
```
....
 -   fftw@3.3.8%gcc@8.3.0+mpi~openmp~pfft_patches precision=double,float arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]      ^mpich@3.3.2%gcc@8.3.0 device=ch4 +hydra netmod=ucx +pci pmi=pmi2 +romio+slurm~verbs+wrapperrpath arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^libpciaccess@0.13.5%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^libxml2@2.9.9%gcc@8.3.0~python arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@8.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^slurm@19-05-3-2%gcc@8.3.0~gtk~hdf5~hwloc~mariadb~pmix+readline arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge

Input spec
--------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/bin/spack", line 64, in <module>
    sys.exit(spack.main.main())
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 715, in main
    return _invoke_command(command, parser, args, unknown)
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 457, in _invoke_command
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/spec.py", line 79, in spec
    print(spec.tree(**kwargs))
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 3836, in tree
    if node.package.installed_upstream:
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1157, in package
    self._package = spack.repo.get(self)
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/repo.py", line 1203, in get
    return path.get(spec)
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/repo.py", line 94, in converter
    return function(self, spec_like, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/repo.py", line 653, in get
    return self.repo_for_pkg(spec).get(spec)
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/repo.py", line 94, in converter
    return function(self, spec_like, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/repo.py", line 885, in get
    raise UnknownPackageError(spec.name)
  File "/home/sas4990/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/repo.py", line 1293, in __init__
    if name.endswith(".yaml"):
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'endswith'
...
```

However, everything works if I specify all the variants to the concretizer : 
```
[sas4990@quser10 ~]$ spack spec -I fftw ^mpich@3.3.2 device=ch4 netmod=ucx pmi=pmi2 +slurm  %gcc@8.3.0
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   fftw
 -       ^mpich@3.3.2%gcc@8.3.0 device=ch4 netmod=ucx pmi=pmi2 +slurm

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   fftw@3.3.8%gcc@8.3.0+mpi~openmp~pfft_patches precision=double,float arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]      ^mpich@3.3.2%gcc@8.3.0 device=ch4 +hydra netmod=ucx +pci pmi=pmi2 +romio+slurm~verbs+wrapperrpath arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^findutils@4.6.0%gcc@8.3.0 patches=84b916c0bf8c51b7e7b28417692f0ad3e7030d1f3c248ba77c42ede5c1c5d11e,bd9e4e5cc280f9753ae14956c4e4aa17fe7a210f55dd6c84aa60b12d106d47a2 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]                  ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@8.3.0 patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 +sigsegv arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]                      ^libsigsegv@2.12%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]                  ^perl@5.30.0%gcc@8.3.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]                      ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]                          ^readline@8.0%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]                              ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@8.3.0~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]                                  ^pkgconf@1.6.3%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^automake@1.16.1%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
 -               ^texinfo@6.5%gcc@8.3.0 patches=12f6edb0c6b270b8c8dba2ce17998c580db01182d871ee32b7b6e4129bd1d23a,1732115f651cff98989cb0215d8f64da5e0f7911ebf0c13b064920f088f2ffe1 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^libpciaccess@0.13.5%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^util-macros@1.19.1%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^libxml2@2.9.9%gcc@8.3.0~python arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]              ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@8.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge
[+]          ^slurm@19-05-3-2%gcc@8.3.0~gtk~hdf5~hwloc~mariadb~pmix+readline arch=linux-rhel7-ivybridge

[sas4990@quser10 ~]$
```


### Information on your system

 1. Platform :  `linux-rhel7-ivybridge`
 2. Custom slurm in `packages.yaml`

If this is a known issue, feel free to close it.
